data.name: 1 Natural Way E-commerce & Marketing Platform
data.summary: Own end-to-end design and development of a revenue-driven e-commerce and marketing platform supporting national health and wellness brands.
highlights: Launched Vue.js + Laravel platform and admin portal; +35% engagement, -20% load time.
Built analytics and campaign systems (Google Analytics, DOMO) driving +40% traffic and +25% conversions.
Automated SendGrid/Twilio messaging to cut manual operations by 50%.
data.stack: Vue.js, Laravel (PHP), PostgreSQL, REST APIs, Figma, Adobe XD, Google Analytics, DOMO, SendGrid, Twilio

data.name: Computer Science Internship Database
data.summary: Built a web-based system to manage internship workflows, approvals, and tracking for the CS program.
highlights: Implemented role-based flows for employer and student data management.
Delivered in PHP Laravel with GitLab and Agile practices.

data.name: Big Data Analytics Projects
data.summary: Analyzed large datasets from the National Climatic Data Center, Amazon electronics, and Chicago traffic tickets using distributed systems.
highlights: Built MapReduce and Spark pipelines with HDFS-based workflows.
Used Hive, Impala, and Pig for data processing and analysis.
data.stack: Hadoop, Spark, Hive, Impala, Pig, HDFS

data.name: SFMS Banking Platform (TCS / IDFC Bank)
data.summary: Built and maintained Java-based SFMS transaction systems for NEFT/RTGS with secure APIs and MQ integrations.
highlights: Delivered 99.99% uptime for national payment processing.
Implemented secure REST APIs and IBM WebSphere MQ integrations with RBI.
Optimized MySQL/Oracle/SQLite databases to reduce processing latency.
data.stack: Java, Spring Boot, IBM WebSphere MQ, MySQL, Oracle, SQLite

data.name: Hospital Web App (TCS Training Project)
data.summary: Developed a full-stack hospital website enabling online workflows and data capture.
highlights: Implemented JavaScript server logic with MySQL integration.
